title: Cranky Compilation of the Best of Grumpy Cat Memes For the Purrpetually Dramatic and Furrever Brooding
description: Grumpy Cat, the woman, the icon, the legend. She will be furrever remembered as the grumpiest cat on the internet and one our purrsonal inspirations for living a stress-free life. You can't get stressed if you expect the bare minimum from everyone, right? Well, we've always felt a special bond with this particularly cantankerous kitty, like our purrpetually dramatic and furrever brooding souls were just cut from the same kitty cloth. That's why, on this terrible Tuesday, we're presenting you with a cranky compilation of the best grumpy cat memes, in our purrsonal opinion.Don't take our word for it (it's not like we're expurrts on cat memes or anything - that was sarcasm, in case you didn't get it), scroll down and see for yourself. These aren't any old silly feline funnies, these are only for the eternally dark souls, the people who wear black in 100 degree weather, and who never met a storm cloud they didn't like. You know who you are. Anyway, we hope you have a very grumpy day, or don't, it doesn't matter to us.
author: Blakeseidel
excerpt: Cranky Compilation of the Best of Grumpy Cat Memes For the Purrpetually Dramatic and Furrever Brooding - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Grumpy Cat, the woman, the icon, the legend. She will be furrever remembered as the grumpiest cat on the internet and one our purrsonal inspirations for living a stress-free life. You can't get stressed if you expect the bare minimum from everyone, right? Well, we've always felt a special bond with this particularly cantankerous kitty, like our purrpetually dramatic and furrever brooding souls were just cut from the same kitty cloth. That's why, on this terrible Tuesday, we're presenting you with a cranky compilation of the best grumpy cat memes, in our purrsonal opinion.

Don't take our word for it (it's not like we're expurrts on cat memes or anything - that was sarcasm, in case you didn't get it), scroll down and see for yourself. These aren't any old silly feline funnies, these are only for the eternally dark souls, the people who wear black in 100 degree weather, and who never met a storm cloud they didn't like. You know who you are. Anyway, we hope you have a very grumpy day, or don't, it doesn't matter to us.
